Hi Dave-

I work for Dr. Dibble at UC Berkeley, and I'm having trouble running the
equilibrate command for constant T&P for a phi=1 in Cantera 1.5. I'm using
the simple commands:

g=GRI30
set(g,'T',298,'P',oneatm,'X','CH4:1,O2:2,N2:7.52')
equilibrate(g,'TP')

And I get this error:

??? Error using ==> thermophase/equilibrate

Procedure: equilibrate
Error:   Cannot find an acceptable Newton damping coefficient.

The same commands seem to work fine in Cantera 1.3.  Any suggestions?

Thanks,
David
